lead_paragraph: Anaheim Ducks owner Henry Samueli has been suspended indefinitely by the N.H.L. The decision by Commissioner Gary Bettman comes a day after Samueli pleaded guilty to one count of making a false statement to the Securities and Exchange Commission.
snippet: Anaheim Ducks owner Henry Samueli has been suspended indefinitely by the N.H.L. The decision by Commissioner Gary Bettman comes a day after Samueli pleaded guilty to one count of making a false statement to the Securities and Exchange Commission.
